boardgame.name: Time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Up! Deluxe
boardgame.description: Time's Up Deluxe is the tenth anniversary edition of one of the most popular party games for gamers! This is a brand new edition, with the best of the cards from the base set and the two expansions (525 cards), a whole bunch of new cards, and best of all, a very handy new electronic timer._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Time's Up! is a party game for teams of two or more players (best with teams of two). The same set of famous names is used for each of three rounds. In each round, one member of a team tries to get his teammates to guess as many names as possible in 30 seconds. In round one, almost any kind of clue is allowed. In round two, no more than one word can be used in each clue (but unlimited sounds and gestures are permitted). In round three, no words are allowed at all._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Includes rules for an odd number of players as well as an optional fourth round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Comes with over 1000 names plus an electronic timer ! And has the new rules for an odd number of players as well as the hilarious new 4th ROUND!

PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

R_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;R Games (RRG979) Time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Up Deluxe is the tenth anniversary edition of one of the most popular party games for gamers! This is a brand new edition, with the best of the cards from the base set and the two expansions (525 cards), a wholebunch of new cards, and best of all, a very handynew electronic timer.525 cards and an electronic timer. Racing through the deck of fame...your team competes in 3 fun-filled rounds toguess the most celebrities. Time is ticking... and you’re scrambling to get your partner toidentify the name on your card. Got it right? Grab another! Wildly Hilarious... can you describe Groucho Marx? Joan of Arc? How about in justone word? Great, but now it’s round three... Be Groucho Marx...They had at least 15 minutes of fame... You have 30 seconds. Do whatever it takes to guess the most celebrities before...

Time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Up! Deluxe R_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;R Games 2008 Complete, components in very good condition. Includes 525 cards (well, I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t actually count them, but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an awful lot); electronic timer; score pad; EZ-Play Rules; plastic box insert (which has a crack but is otherwise in good shape). Timer works. Box has no split corners, minor shelf wear. Lid is somewhat caved in, like someone set a heavy weight in the middle. (7)
